message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this amazing product for $140. It's worth a lot more to you, so you'll be getting a great deal!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! I can come down a bit, but $135 is the lowest I can go. It's still a great deal for you, considering how much it's worth.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to meet me at $130 again?

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but I'm firm on $135. It's a fair price, considering how much value you'll get from this product. We're nearing the end of our negotiation, so I'm hoping we can reach an agreement soon.
I understand you're firm on $135, but I'm still a bit short. Can you meet me halfway again? I'm willing to compromise at $132.50
